relevant_patterns.description: Applying microservices architecture can improve scalability and maintainability of the task management app
Implementing GDPR compliance can ensure the app meets data protection standards
Applying user-centered design principles can improve user experience and engagement
Using API-based integration can improve scalability and maintainability of the app

suggestions.suggestion: Implement real-time task updates and notifications
suggestions.rationale: Users expect real-time updates and notifications to improve productivity and engagement
Two-factor authentication can improve security and protect user data

suggestions.suggestion: Use load balancing and caching to improve scalability
suggestions.rationale: Load balancing and caching can improve performance and scalability of the app

compliance_notes: Ensure compliance with GDPR regulations regarding data protection and user consent
Implement data encryption and secure authentication protocols
integration_recommendations: Integrate with popular productivity tools such as Google Calendar and Slack
Use API-based integration to improve scalability and maintainability
